item.title: Coldplay - Trouble
item.description:
KY: 60949

Oh no I see
a spiderweb
It’s tangled
up with me
And I lost
my head
The thought
of all the
Stupid things
I said

Oh no
what’s this
A spiderweb and I’m
caught in the middle
So I turned
to run
The thought
of all the
Stupid things
I’ve done
And ah I never
meant to
Cause you
trouble
And ah I never
meant to
Do you
wrong
And I well if I ever
caused you trouble
Then oh no I never
meant to do you harms

Oh no
I see
A spiderweb and it’s
me in the middle
So I twist
and turn
But here am I
in my little bubble
Singin’ out I never
meant to
Cause you
trouble
And ah I never meant
to do you wrong

caused you trouble

to do you harms

They spun
a web for me
They spun
a web for me
